revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR1043ND |revision=v2.x |series=N450 |upc=845973051389 |asin=B002YLAUU8 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/31/2013 |fcc_id=TE7WR1043NDV2 |ic_id=8853A-WR1043ND |pcb_id=2050500314 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A, PN8B888.002C, 1304, CHINA; |cpu1_cspeed=720 |cpu1_cores= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64FVSIG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A, PN8B888.002C, 1304, CHINA; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N;AR8327N-AT4A; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4 GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2574BL-R;;3; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_[0-9A-F]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=64:66:B3, C0:4A:00 |oui_eth=64:66:B3, C0:4A:00 }} {{TagLine|450Mbps Wireless N Gigabit Router}} {{startflatlist|indent=1}} *[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=238&model=TL-WR1043ND Product page] *[http://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/TL-WR1043ND/index.htm Firmware Interface] *[http://www.tplink.com/en/support/download/?model=TL-WR1043ND&version=V2 Downloads] {{endflatlist}} "2050500314" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr1043nd ''TP-LINK TL-WR1043ND'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] The firmware differs from TL-WR1043ND v3.x in the addition in: :- IPv6 support :- Wireless Guest Network The hardware seems to be identical. ==Images== File:TL-WR1043ND-v2_01.jpg File:TL-WR1043ND-v2_02.jpg File:TL-WR1043ND-v2_03.jpg File:TL-WR1043ND-v2_04.jpg File:TL-WR1043ND-v2_05.jpg [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
